climbs.name: Indian Traverse
climbs.description: Start is down the path, way down by a tree that is growing on the rock. Finish up on the slab near the stairs

climbs.name: The Slab
climbs.description: The face that is along the path directly under the stairs. Could be used for beginner top rope

climbs.name: Center Overhang
climbs.description: Stand start on left side of the pit area. Go up the center to a highball finish over the lip.

climbs.name: Watercouse
climbs.description: In the corner of the 'pit', just right of the gap. Go up the corner into the huge jug, then finish the easy but high top out

climbs.name: Scary Arete
climbs.description: On the upper boulder, on the face toward the road. Left side, stand start with left hand in gaston pocket, then up to good pockets. At the first lip go left to the arete.

climbs.name: Scary Overhang
climbs.description: Same start as Scary Arete (in high left hand gaston pocket, up the pockets), but at the first lip, continue straight up

climbs.name: Warm-up Slab
climbs.description: On back side of upper boulder, do any of the routes or traverse using any of the indents or pockets.

climbs.name: Scott's Arete
climbs.description: On the upper boulder, on the road-side, in the center. Start with high antenae-shaped hold, and the arete, then use side-pull to the left and go up.

climbs.name: Turtle Traverse
climbs.description: Start on the far right (north) side, near the down-climb, then move left all the way around to the south side while staying below the lip.

climbs.name: The Lieback
climbs.description: In the middle of the rock, stand start on the protruding arete and go up

climbs.name: South Solo
climbs.description: On the south side of the rock (city-side), go up the highball, full-featured face.

climbs.name: The Old Man
climbs.description: On the big boulder, on middle of the ocean side, go up to highball finish, or down-climb

climbs.name: Old Woman Arete
climbs.description: On the boulder just north of the big boulder, go up the sharp arete that starts between the two.
